articles.title: Delta variant better capable of evading immune system: Study - The New Indian Express
articles.description: While infection due to other variants alerted the immune system quickly, Delta variant silently replicates in host cells, find scientists
articles.content: HYDERABAD: The researchers at CSIR- Centre for Cellular and Molecular Biology found that the human immune system cant produce the defence molecules against the Delta variant as effectively as against… [+4858 chars]
